title: digital Geneva Convention
extract: We urgently need new norms and conventions that will protect civilian interests: a Geneva Convention for the digital world. The Geneva Conventions are a set of rules that seeks, in times of armed conflict, to protect civilians who are not participating in the hostilities.Apr 23, 2018
extract_html: We urgently need new norms and conventions that will protect civilian interests: a Geneva Convention for the digital world. The Geneva Conventions are a set of rules that seeks, in times of armed conflict, to protect civilians who are not participating in the hostilities.Apr 23, 2018
